task.title: Add Language
task.shortdesc: Follow these steps to add a language to a TMX file.

step.cmd: Open the TMX file that you want to modify.
In main menu, select Tasks Add Language... .
step.stepresult: The following dialog appears: Add Language Dialog

step.cmd: Use the drop-down box to select the language to add.

step.stepresult: The dialog closes and the editing window is refreshed to reflect the changes.
